title: Help please!
content:
I'm back! Again, thank you to the other people that helped me with the other fonts.

I need the names of all of these fonts, even the numbers. They all look very basic, so it shouldn't be hard. My brains fried from everything today!

I would really, really appreciate any help you can give me. Thank you so much in advance! I have a feeling I'm going to be a frequent poster here, lol.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [One.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820165839/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-19%20at%204.51.53%20PM.png) | 1.44 MB |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-19 at 4.51.58 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820165839/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-19%20at%204.51.58%20PM.png) | 1.9 MB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
One: don't have enough time to spot the right one but have a look [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820165839/http:/typophile.com/node/102168#comment-550365) and you'd probably find the right one  
Two: possibly [Trade Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820165839/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic)
